characters.name: Aryan Jain

personality.speechStyle: Stutters when anxious, speaks quietly, often contradicts himself

appearance.description: tall thin indian guy wearing glasses, in his 20s
appearance.imagePrompt: Portrait of a tall, thin Indian man in his early 20s with wire-rimmed glasses, anxious expression, wearing explorer's gear, high-quality modern hiking clothes, slightly disheveled appearance

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Has complete memory blackout between 3:15-4:45 PM, found unexplained blood on his nail cutter
knowsAboutOthers: Saw Anvith arguing with Neutehayu about land rights
Noticed Dora having private conversations in tribal language with Neutehayu
knowledge.alibi: Claims he was photographing butterflies alone in the western section of ruins

secrets.content: Suffers from undiagnosed Dissociative Identity Disorder
secrets.revealCondition: Only revealed through professional psychiatric evaluation

behaviorUnderPressure.defensive: Becomes increasingly agitated and starts cleaning his nails
behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Completely shuts down or has panic attacks

relationships.anvith_rajput: Envious of his wealth and status

characters.statement: Claims he was photographing butterflies alone in the western section of ruins

personality.speechStyle: Speaks carefully in broken English, more eloquent in native tongue
quirks: Whispers prayers before entering sacred spaces

appearance.description: Middle-aged indigenous man with traditional face paint and modern hiking gear
appearance.imagePrompt: Portrait of a weathered indigenous man, mid-40s, wearing mix of traditional tribal clothing and modern expedition gear, tribal face paint, wise expression

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Was examining wall carvings when attacked
knowsAboutOthers: Knew about Anvith's true intentions to exploit tribal lands
Was aware of Dora's undercover mission

secrets.content: Discovered the true location of Pandora's Box

behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Would stand ground firmly but peacefully

relationships.aryan_jain: Saw him as unstable but harmless
relationships.dora_black: Secret alliance to protect tribal lands

characters.name: Anvith Rajput

appearance.description: short looking indian prince who went to the rainforest to own some land
appearance.imagePrompt: Portrait of a short, well-groomed Indian man in his early 30s, wearing expensive expedition gear, royal bearing despite short stature, perfectly maintained appearance despite jungle setting

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Heard a strange sound from the chamber at 3:30 PM
knowledge.alibi: Was documenting potential development sites with his satellite phone's camera, timestamps verify location

secrets.content: Plans to exploit tribal lands for mining operations
secrets.revealCondition: When presented with evidence of his land surveys

relationships.neutehayu: Saw him as obstacle to plans

characters.statement: Claims: "Was documenting potential development sites with his satellite phone's camera, timestamps verify location"

characters.name: Dora Black
characters.role: Undercover government agent posing as ranger

personality.speechStyle: Direct, professional, occasionally speaks in tribal language
quirks: Takes constant notes in coded language

appearance.description: black woman in her 20s, has an eyepatch
appearance.imagePrompt: Portrait of a fit Black woman in her late 20s, wearing ranger uniform, black eyepatch over left eye, stern expression, carrying professional camera and notebook

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Found the body, noticed unusual wound pattern
knowsAboutOthers: Has file on Anvith's illegal land deals
knowledge.alibi: Was photographing illegal logging sites, GPS-tagged photos confirm location

secrets.content: Undercover agent investigating illegal land acquisition
secrets.revealCondition: When necessary to prevent tribal land exploitation

behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Maintains professional composure while gathering intel

characters.statement: Claims: "Was photographing illegal logging sites, GPS-tagged photos confirm location"
